Keywords: Fantastic Four , Monster
Real Name: Sharon Ventura
Special Powers
DON'T WORRY, I CAN TAKE A HIT: She-Thing takes a maximum of 1 damage from the first attack that hits her each turn. At the end of each turn, heal her 1 click if she was hit by a range attack that turn.
HAD ENOUGH YET?: Close Combat Expert. When She-Thing uses it, you may modify attack or damage by an additional +1.
Trade She-Thing Want She-Thing

May 17, 2021
Goop
CCE now being passive she gets a bit of a bump. Her stats are kinda low so you get that pumped up CCE to offset it how you want. 11/4 or 12/3. She is DEFINITELY a piece you want to swap in with FF trait when you see your facing an all range team. The 1 max dmg at range is what she is all about.
October 15, 2020
hoojeebo
More specifically, there is a distinction between "damage dealt", which comes before damage reducers, and "damage taken", which is the final result that a character takes after all reductions, avoidance checks, etc.
October 15, 2020
fastcat99
After. It says 'max' of 1 damage. So that means the attacker would at least have to deal enough that she takes one click, she just doesn't take more than that.
